    • Uses of Component in peril.views.slick.components

      Classes in peril.views.slick.components that implement Component 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MiniMap
      This class models a MiniMap that will display the entirety of the ModelBoard and will allow the user to move around their view of the ModelBoard.
      class  ProgressBar
      Encapsulates the behaviours of a progress bar that can be displayed on screen.
      class  ScrollBar
      Encapsulates the behaviour of a ScrollBar.
      private class  ScrollBar.Slider
      The slider that appears on the ScrollBar.
      class  TextField
      This object is a visual component that can be used to display a block of text on the screen.
      class  VisualList<T>
      Encapsulates the behaviours a List of VisualList.Elements that can be displayed on screen and clicked on screen.

      Displays the Challenges of the game to the user.

      A page on the HelpMenu that links to a next and previous HelpMenu.HelpPage.
      class  Menu
      Encapsulates the behaviour of a menu that can be displayed in a InteractiveState.

      Encapsulates the behaviour of a Pause Menu.

      A Menu that displays ModelPlayer's information to the user.
      class  UpgradeMenu
      Encapsulates the behaviour of a Menu that allows the user to upgrade the selected ModelCountry and upgrade ModelUnits for points.
      private class  UpgradeMenu.UnitTrader
      A object that when clicked upgrades the specified ModelUnit to the ModelUnit above it in terms of strength.
      class  WarMenu
      Displays the CombatHelper from the Attack to the user.
